 > we didn't get much talking in this subgect...

I kept waiting for this topic to be picked up and replied to.  Since
no person bothered to reply to it, I moved on.

I was hoping for a rather large (and long) amount of discussion about
features for Gladiator:Beyond Freedom.  You have to realize there is
only so much you can do in Gladiator the way it is currently coded.

Things like speeding up chain-lightning (as indicated by Tom Ricket)
would require changing a lot of things.  Adding formation control to
your team is another because the game would have to be changed from
the inside to make it better suited for that type of thing.  Things
like adding new characters and adding (most) new attacks won't require
significantly changing the code.
